channel.title: Advanced Use on SpectralAnalysis: Software for the masses
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced Use on SpectralAnalysis: Software for the masses

item.title: Integration with MATLAB
item.description: When running SpectralAnalysis from within MATLAB (i.e. using the source code version), it is possible to extract data to the workspace for further processing.

item.title: Extending SpectralAnalysis
item.description: SpectralAnalysis was written with extensibility in mind. To Adding new preprocessing Adding new postprocessing Adding new parsers
